onboarding.title: Organize Your Shopping!
onboarding.text: Create personalized lists and simplify your shopping experience.

onboarding.title: Never Forget an Item
onboarding.text: Register your favorite products and keep track of what you need.

onboarding.title: Smart Shopping, Time Savings
onboarding.text: Optimize your shopping routine with our user-friendly app and enhance your productivity.

onboarding.title: Make Shopping Fun
onboarding.text: Discover an exciting way to do your daily shopping with interactive features.

onboarding.title: Your Personal Shopping Assistant
onboarding.text: Get personalized recommendations and stay in control of your budget at all times.
